summary.para: Describes the content of the packet for a particular tablet recognizer context.
Do not use this structure to access the data contained in a packet. This structure describes the content of the packet.

member.name: PACKET_DESCRIPTION.cbPacketSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the packet data.

member.name: PACKET_DESCRIPTION.cPacketProperties
member.summary: The number of elements in the pPacketProperties array.
